::Shadow Wing::

She heard the messge come over her commlink.  She responded, "On my 
way Prowl. Shadow Wing Out." She flew to the old base.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl/Striker/Kluster/Chordate/Killer/Annihilator/Zeus/Ramhorn/Smo
ke
> screen::
> 
> Prowl apears near the Ark, nearly falling out of the sky from 
> exaustion. His energy levels quickly recover and he stands up.
> 
> "I'm back, everyone," he says into his comm-link. He turns around 
to 
> fly off, seeing Shuko and his bots advancing on the Ark.
> 
> "All Maximal units, return to the Ark immediately!" he says into 
his 
> comm-link, "The preds decided to launch another attack."
> 
> He tranforms into his robot mode, flying forward and firing a shot 
at 
> Ares.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker apears in his quarters, nodding as he recieves Prowl's 
> transmission. He transforms into beast mode, setting off toward the 
> Ark.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster apears back at the Cybertronian Fire, recieving Phobia's 
> transmission.
> 
> "You have clearence to land outside the shields," he replies, "Be 
> careful, though, the defences will be aimed at you for security 
> reasons."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Chordate flies off toward the Ark. His scanners detecting a new 
pod, 
> he changes course, heading for where his scanners picked up the new 
> bot (Riptide). A fresh warrior would be useful for fighting the 
> predacons.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramhorn and Smokescreen run out of the Ark, firing at Shuko and 
Hades.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Killer, and Zeus run out of the newcomer base, heading for the Ark. 
> Annihilator stays behind in case anyone attacked.
